docs.lead_paragraph: HUMAN fat, like the human beard and the franc, keeps getting revalued. Certain African tribes used to fatten up their girls for marriage on the theory that if a 110-pound bride is good a 220-pound one is twice as good. Artists in times past liked their women plump, and their pictures ...

headline.main: 'We Think Ourselves Into Fatness'; Getting and staying that way is mostly a matter of psychology, doctors now say.

docs.abstract: R G Whalen article holds overeating psychosomatic; illus
